__TOC__



This week's Hug Day will focus on '''Firefox 3'''! We are all aware of how important Firefox is to the world, so let's get our hands dirty and triage some bugs!

After you have triaged or fixed a bug put your name in the last column and set the row's background to green by adding '''lightgreen''' in the first cell of the column after '''rowbgcolor='''.  This will let people know that the bug in that row has been hugged.

=== 5-a-day-ing ===
During hug days you can also do <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/5-A-Day|5-A-Day]]</nowiki> for this one you can do the following in order to tag your work on the hug day:

* 5-a-day --add-tag hugday-20081009
* Add bugs to 5-a-day as usual
* And when done with hug day run: 5-a-day --remove-tag hugday-20081009

=== Important Information for triaging Firefox Bugs ===

Especially when triaging New and Incomplete bugs, please take a look at the <nowiki>[[MozillaTeam-Bugs-TriagersHandbook]]</nowiki>. It's supposed to provide a quick overview of the
requirements and how to triage specific bug states for firefox (e.g. New, Incomplete, Confirmed, etc.).

Remember that our goal is to get good bugs upstream. To achieve that, we have <nowiki>[[MozillaTeam-NormalizedBugFormat]]</nowiki> which is ment to be a requirement 
for bugs to become "Confirmed".

If you have questions about specific cases, or about the documents above, please contact AlexanderSack (asac on irc) or Brian Murray (bdmurray) in #ubuntu-mozillateam or #ubuntu-bugs.

=== Stock Responses ===

For problem specific Stock Responses see: ('''Does not apply for firefox''': please dont use the standard stock responses, better look at the <nowiki>[[MozillaTeam-Bugs-TriagersHandbook]]</nowiki>).

* Verify the bug is still not fixed
* Request any needed info, Subscribe, Status to incomplete '''or'''
* Set status to Confirmed

=== 131 Confirmed Bugs ===
'''To mark it off the list you should:'''
* Verify the bug is still not fixed
* read the <nowiki>[[MozillaTeam-Bugs-TriagersHandbook]]</nowiki>
* look if all information for <nowiki>[[MozillaTeam-NormalizedBugFormat]]</nowiki> is available and take care that the bug is in that format.
* Request any needed info, Subscribe, Status to incomplete '''or'''
* Set status to Triaged <nowiki>[[BugControl]]</nowiki>
